channel.title: Dark Rune - HTML Template
channel.description:
Most of you know that I've been developing a CMS for RSPS sites which will feature alot of content. This is the first template that I made for it. The template will not be used in the CMS as I've designed a much better looking one that suits the CMS. (This was also one of the first template I've made completely build from scratch and some elements look pretty bad if I do say so myself.)
[Noticed that the logo looks f* up]
[center] PREVIEW: [img]http://puu.sh/3KL8a.jpg[/img]
The PSD will not be available. I am however considering releasing the PSD files for the Slider and Quick Nav (depends on you guys).
[b][u]Credits: [/u][/b]
Me: Designing the template/slider + coding it Evil-S: Menu Design (PSD Only) Jagex: Runescape Images dev7studios: Nivo Slider base
[b]You Accept following terms by downloading this template.[/b] [code] *The Footer will not be altered. You may not remove anything from the footer. You can however your own footer regarding copyright on content/images you deliver. *This template was designed by me, do not claim is at yours. *You will not re-destribute thsi without permission. *This template was designed by me, do not claim is at yours. [/code]
[url=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/download/k5s02y3yns0oufr/DarkRune%5BMopar%5D.rar"]DOWNLOAD[/url][/center]

item.title: Dark Rune - HTML Template
item.dc:creator: @TheAmmoBandit TheAmmoBandit
item.description:
@TheAmmoBandit wrote:

Samih1996:

Hah, yeah. There is a lot of work to it. But I did it before, When your finished with it. You will feel great.

The thing is, I feel that the template is now just a fraction of what I can do and I can’t be bothered to put time and effort in an old template when I have others to work on or that are actually worth it to port over.

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Rune - HTML Template
item.dc:creator: @firstchoice8 firstchoice8
item.description:
@firstchoice8 wrote:

[quote=“thekid120, post:11, topic:526001”]You could i use this for my Website???

Do you give me the permission For it??? i will keep the footer unedited[/quote]

Everyone has permission to use it as long as they follow these terms, no point releasing a download if people need permission to use it.

*The Footer will not be altered. You may not remove anything from the footer. You can however your own footer regarding copyright on content/images you deliver. *This template was designed by me, do not claim is at yours. *You will not re-destribute thsi without permission. *This template was designed by me, do not claim is at yours.
